item.title: BayFirst Financial Corp S-1
item.description: BayFirst Financial Corp, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC S-1 filing on January 20, 2022 had 56272 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 718 instances 1 - 626 instances stock - 600 instances loan - 533 instances 2020 - 464 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
